roleset.name: left to choice, not required

role.descr: who, what arg1 is not necessarily required for

example.name: Arg1 only
example.text: Kids are taught to read and write by the end of primary school , those that ca n't by that stage should be given extra help anyway , so English should be optional at secondary school .

example.name: All args
example.text: We mean school is optional for learning.

roleset.note: OPTIONAL-J NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT P01, parts 2,3. Framed by Claire. (from optional.01-j)
